verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> So king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> Solomon מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> was king עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over all Israel ס

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> And these [were] the princes אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֑וֹ עֲזַרְיָ֥הוּ <WH5838> which he had Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son צָד֖וֹק <WH6659> of Zadok הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> the priest ס

אֱלִיחֹ֧רֶף <WH456> Elihoreph וַאֲחִיָּ֛ה <WH281> and Ahiah בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons שִׁישָׁ֖א <WH7894> of Shisha סֹפְרִ֑ים <WH5608> scribes יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיל֖וּד <WH286> of Ahilud הַמַּזְכִּֽיר׃ <WH2142> the recorder

וּבְנָיָ֥הוּ <WH1141> And Benaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֖ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada עַל־ <WH5921> over הַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> [was] over the host וְצָד֥וֹק <WH6659> and Zadok וְאֶבְיָתָ֖ר <WH54> and Abiathar כֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> [were] the priests ס

וַעֲזַרְיָ֥הוּ <WH5838> And Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son נָתָ֖ן <WH5416> of Nathan עַל־ <WH5921> over הַנִּצָּבִ֑ים <WH5324> [was] over the officers וְזָב֧וּד <WH2071> and Zabud בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נָתָ֛ן <WH5416> of Nathan כֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> [was] principal officer רֵעֶ֥ה <WH7463> friend הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> [and] the king's

וַאֲחִישָׁ֖ר <WH301> And Ahishar עַל־ <WH5921> was over הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> [was] over the household וַאֲדֹנִירָ֥ם <WH141> and Adoniram בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַבְדָּ֖א <WH5653> of Abda עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמַּֽס׃ <WH4522> [was] over the tribute ס

וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֞ה <WH8010> And Solomon שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֤ר <WH6240> ten נִצָּבִים֙ <WH5324> officers עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over all Israel וְכִלְכְּל֥וּ <WH3557> which provided victuals אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> for the king וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> and his household חֹ֧דֶשׁ <WH2320> his month בַּשָּׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> in a year יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> over [אֶחָד כ] (הָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> a ק) לְכַלְכֵּֽל׃ <WH3557> made provision ס
וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמוֹתָ֔ם <WH8034> And these [are] their names בֶּן־ ח֖וּר <WH1133> The son of Hur בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> Ephraim ס
בֶּן־ דֶּ֛קֶר <WH1128> Ben-deker בְּמָקַ֥ץ <WH4739> in Makaz וּבְשַֽׁעַלְבִ֖ים <WH8169> and in Shaalbim וּבֵ֣ית שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH1053> and Bethshemesh וְאֵיל֖וֹן בֵּ֥ית חָנָֽן׃ <WH358> and Elonbethhanan ס
בֶּן־ חֶ֖סֶד <WH1136> Ben-hesed בָּֽאֲרֻבּ֑וֹת <WH700> in Aruboth ל֥וֹ שֹׂכֹ֖ה <WH7755> to him [pertained] Sochoh וְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> and all the land חֵֽפֶר׃ <WH2660> of Hepher ס

בֶּן־ אֲבִֽינָדָ֖ב <WH1125> The son of Abinadab כָּל־ <WH3605> all נָ֣פַת <WH5299> in all the region דֹּ֑אר <WH1756> of Dor טָפַת֙ <WH2955> which had Taphath בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> of Solomon הָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> become לּ֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife ס

בַּֽעֲנָא֙ <WH1195> Baana בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיל֔וּד <WH286> of Ahilud תַּעְנַ֖ךְ <WH8590> [to him pertained] Taanach וּמְגִדּ֑וֹ <WH4023> and Megiddo וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֣ית שְׁאָ֡ן <WH1052> and all Bethshean אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which אֵ֨צֶל <WH681> which [is] by צָרְתַ֜נָה <WH6891> Zartanah מִתַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash לְיִזְרְעֶ֗אל <WH3157> beneath Jezreel מִבֵּ֤ית שְׁאָן֙ <WH1052> from Bethshean עַ֚ד <WH5704> far אָבֵ֣ל מְחוֹלָ֔ה <WH65> to Abelmeholah עַ֖ד <WH5704> far מֵעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> [even] unto [the place that is] beyond לְיָקְמֳעָֽם׃ <WH3361> Jokneam ס

בֶּן־ גֶּ֖בֶר <WH1127> The son of Geber בְּרָמֹ֣ת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> which [are] in Gilead ל֡וֹ חַוֹּת֩ <WH2333> to him [pertained] the towns יָאִ֨יר <WH2971> of Jair בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <WH4519> of Manasseh אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּגִּלְעָ֗ד <WH1568> Gilead ל֚וֹ חֶ֤בֶל <WH2256> to him [also pertained] the region אַרְגֹּב֙ <WH709> of Argob אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> which [is] in Bashan שִׁשִּׁים֙ <WH8346> threescore עָרִ֣ים <WH5892> cities גְּדֹל֔וֹת <WH1419> great חוֹמָ֖ה <WH2346> with walls וּבְרִ֥יחַ <WH1280> bars נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> and brasen ס
אֲחִֽינָדָ֥ב <WH292> Ahinadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עִדֹּ֖א <WH5714> of Iddo מַחֲנָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4266> [had] Mahanaim

אֲחִימַ֖עַץ <WH290> Ahimaaz בְּנַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> [was] in Naphtali גַּם־ <WH1571> also ה֗וּא <WH1931> he לָקַ֛ח <WH3947> he also took אֶת־ <WH853> בָּשְׂמַ֥ת <WH1315> Basmath בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> of Solomon לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife
בַּֽעֲנָא֙ <WH1195> Baanah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חוּשָׁ֔י <WH2365> of Hushai בְּאָשֵׁ֖ר <WH836> [was] in Asher וּבְעָלֽוֹת׃ <WH1175> and in Aloth ס
יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פָּר֖וּחַ <WH6515> of Paruah בְּיִשָׂשכָֽר׃ <WH3485> in Issachar ס
שִׁמְעִ֥י <WH8096> Shimei בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֵלָ֖א <WH414> of Elah בְּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> in Benjamin ס

גֶּ֥בֶר <WH1398> Geber בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֻרִ֖י <WH221> of Uri בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> [was] in the country גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> of Gilead אֶ֜רֶץ <WH776> [in] the country סִיח֣וֹן ׀ <WH5511> of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <WH567> of the Amorites וְעֹג֙ <WH5747> and of Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> of Bashan וּנְצִ֥יב <WH5333> officer אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and [he was] the only אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> which [was] in the land

יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> and Israel רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> [were] many כַּח֥וֹל <WH2344> as the sand אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> which [is] by the sea לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> in multitude אֹכְלִ֥ים <WH398> eating וְשֹׁתִ֖ים <WH8354> and drinking וּשְׂמֵחִֽים׃ <WH8056> and making merry

וּשְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> And Solomon הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become מוֹשֵׁל֙ <WH4910> reigned בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַמַּמְלָכ֔וֹת <WH4467> over all kingdoms מִן־ <WH4480> from הַנָּהָר֙ <WH5104> from the river אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> unto the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> and to גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> and unto the border מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מַגִּשִׁ֥ים <WH5066> they brought מִנְחָ֛ה <WH4503> presents וְעֹבְדִ֥ים <WH5647> and served אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the days חַיָּֽיו׃ <WH2416> of his life פ

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become לֶֽחֶם־ <WH3899> provision שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> And Solomon's לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> for one שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> was thirty כֹּר֙ <WH3734> measures סֹ֔לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour וְשִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> and threescore כֹּ֖ר <WH3734> measures קָֽמַח׃ <WH7058> of meal

עֲשָׂרָ֨ה <WH6235> Ten בָקָ֜ר <WH1241> oxen בְּרִאִ֗ים <WH1277> fat וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty בָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> oxen רְעִ֖י <WH7471> out of the pastures וּמֵ֣אָה <WH3967> and an hundred צֹ֑אן <WH6629> sheep לְ֠בַד <WH905> alone מֵֽאַיָּ֤ל <WH354> beside harts וּצְבִי֙ <WH6643> and roebucks וְיַחְמ֔וּר <WH3180> and fallowdeer וּבַרְבֻּרִ֖ים <WH1257> fowl אֲבוּסִֽים׃ <WH75> and fatted

כִּי־ <WH3588> for ה֞וּא <WH1931> he רֹדֶ֣ה ׀ <WH7287> For he had dominion בְּכָל־ <WH3605> everything עֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> over all [the region] on this side הַנָּהָ֗ר <WH5104> the river מִתִּפְסַח֙ <WH8607> from Tiphsah וְעַד־ <WH5704> even עַזָּ֔ה <WH5804> even to Azzah בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מַלְכֵ֖י <WH4428> over all the kings עֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> on this side הַנָּהָ֑ר <WH5104> the river וְשָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> and he had peace הָ֥יָה <WH1961> had ל֛וֹ מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָרָ֖יו <WH5676> sides מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וַיֵּשֶׁב֩ <WH3427> dwelt יְהוּדָ֨ה <WH3063> And Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> and Israel לָבֶ֗טַח <WH983> safely אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man תַּ֤חַת <WH8478> under גַּפְנוֹ֙ <WH1612> under his vine וְתַ֣חַת <WH8478> under תְּאֵֽנָת֔וֹ <WH8384> and under his fig tree מִדָּ֖ן <WH1835> from Dan וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <WH884> even to Beersheba כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the days שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> of Solomon ס

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become לִשְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> And Solomon אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> had forty אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand אֻרְוֹ֥ת <WH723> stalls סוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> of horses לְמֶרְכָּב֑וֹ <WH4817> for his chariots וּשְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand פָּרָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6571> horsemen

וְכִלְכְּלוּ֩ <WH3557> provided victual הַנִּצָּבִ֨ים <WH5324> And those officers הָאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> Those אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> for king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> Solomon וְאֵ֧ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַקָּרֵ֛ב <WH7131> and for all that came אֶל־ <WH413> about שֻׁלְחַ֥ן <WH7979> table הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> unto king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon's אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man חָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH2320> in his month לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יְעַדְּר֖וּ <WH5737> they lacked דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> nothing

וְהַשְּׂעֹרִ֣ים <WH8184> Barley וְהַתֶּ֔בֶן <WH8401> also and straw לַסּוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> for the horses וְלָרָ֑כֶשׁ <WH7409> and dromedaries יָבִ֗אוּ <WH935> brought אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> they unto the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become שָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> it אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> where [the officers] were every man כְּמִשְׁפָּטֽוֹ׃ <WH4941> according to his charge ס

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <WH5414> gave אֱלֹהִ֨ים <WH430> And God חָכְמָ֧ה <WH2451> wisdom לִשְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> Solomon וּתְבוּנָ֖ה <WH8394> and understanding הַרְבֵּ֣ה <WH7235> much מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> exceeding וְרֹ֣חַב <WH7341> and largeness לֵ֔ב <WH3820> of heart כַּח֕וֹל <WH2344> even as the sand אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> shore הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> that [is] on the sea

וַתֵּ֙רֶב֙ <WH7235> excelled חָכְמַ֣ת <WH2451> wisdom שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> And Solomon's מֵֽחָכְמַ֖ת <WH2451> the wisdom כָּל־ <WH3605> of all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of all the children קֶ֑דֶם <WH6924> of the east country וּמִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and all חָכְמַ֥ת <WH2451> and all the wisdom מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיֶּחְכַּם֮ <WH2449> For he was wiser מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הָֽאָדָם֒ <WH120> than all men מֵאֵיתָ֣ן <WH387> than Ethan הָאֶזְרָחִ֗י <WH250> the Ezrahite וְהֵימָ֧ן <WH1968> and Heman וְכַלְכֹּ֛ל <WH3633> and Chalcol וְדַרְדַּ֖ע <WH1862> and Darda בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons מָח֑וֹל <WH4235> of Mahol וַיְהִֽי־ <WH1961> become שְׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> and his fame בְכָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> was in all nations סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about
